column4: how can I install http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy/libgmime-2.0-2 for ubuntu 11.10?
sudo apt-get install libgmime-2.6-0     and you should be ok, unless you need the old version....
I only see  libgmime-2.4-2  when I search for libgmime, not 2.6
oh yes, ubottu defaults to the latest stable (precise)
